General.Name: Beijing YJK Building Software Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Beijing YJK Building Software Co.,Ltd. develops and sells building structure design software and BIM-related products in China and internationally. The company offers YJK building structure design system, green building energy-saving design and carbon emission calculation, BIM collaboration and ecological, bridge design products for use in residential buildings, office buildings, stadiums, bridges, municipal facilities, subway stations, industrial plants, petrochemical equipment, power structures, civil buildings and infrastructure, and other industrial; and building industrialization, construction, assembly, electromechanical, interface, and other software products for construction and infrastructure industries. It also provides technical services. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
